translations.chinese: 漢王出行軍，疾甚，因馳入成皋。
translations.english: King Han went out to encourage the troops, but his illness was severe, so he galloped into Chenggao.

translations.chinese: 十一月，韓信與灌嬰擊破楚軍，殺楚將龍且，追至城陽，虜齊王廣。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, Han Xin and Guan Ying attacked and broke the Chu army, killed Chu general Long Ju, pursued to Chengyang, and captured King Qi Tian Guang.

translations.chinese: 齊相田橫自立為齊王，奔彭越。
translations.english: Qi chancellor Tian Heng established himself as King of Qi and fled to Peng Yue.
Han established Zhang Er as King of Zhao.

translations.chinese: 漢王疾瘉，西入關，至櫟陽，存問父老，置酒。
translations.english: King Han recovered from his illness, entered the passes to the west, reached Queyang, visited the elders, and held a banquet.
